DOC.brief_summary: To compare the Octopus 311 and the HFA 700 series
DOC.brief_title: To Compare the Octopus 311 and the Humphrey Field Analyzer 700 Series
DOC.detailed_description: To compare the Octopus 311 and the HFA 700 series to evaluate reliability, reproducibility, test duration, patient preference and technician preference.
DOC.criteria: Prior Visual Field Scotopic pupil less than 3 mm
